content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. To begin our discussion, let's start negotiating the rental price without going into further details for now. If we reach an agreement on a price you find acceptable, I'll gladly share more information. Please propose a price that works for you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and the apartment's condition, I cautiously suggest initiating discussions around 650 Euros per month. However, I am open to further negotiations to find a mutually agreeable price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While I appreciate your interest in our apartment and the initial price suggestion, let me counter your offer with a higher rental price. I agree to the price of 720 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I regretfully find the proposed 720 Euros per month to be higher than my budget and comfort zone for this apartment. I don't want to continue the negotiation due to this significant disparity in our price expectations. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
